channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Novo chairman to step down in board rift over pace of change
item.description: The move is part of a wider shakeup at the maker of Wegovy and Ozempic drugs, with more than half of the board members set to depart.

item.title: Millionaire tax that inspired Mamdani fuels $5.7 billion haul in Massachusetts
item.description: In two years levying a 4% surtax on incomes over $1 million, it's funded bridge repairs, bolstered literacy programs and tackled a transportation defi...

item.title: Salesforce revamps Agentforce to try to pull customers across the gap between AI capabilities and AI adoption
item.description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff acknowledges enterprises need hand-holding to build effective AI agents

item.title: OpenAI unveils its Atlas web browser in a bid to supplant Google as the internet’s universal starting point
item.description: ChatGPT Atlas looks and works much like a standard web browser but infuses generative AI capabilities throughout the experience.

item.title: ‘If there’s no bottom rung on the ladder, it’s really hard to leap up’: Nonprofits focused on Gen Z employment get $25m Citi Foundation windfall
item.description: Citi Foundation identified youth employability as the theme for its $25 million Global Innovation Challenge this year.

item.title: Netflix shares fall after streaming giant reports profit miss
Why are more people falling behind on car loans? Student loans give us a clue.
Dow ends at record high, S&P 500 flat, Nasdaq slips as earnings season ramps up
Dow rising, S&P 500 and Nasdaq lag in final hour ahead of Netflix results — live
Gold logs biggest daily selloff in years. Is it a hiccup, or have prices peaked?
